author: smuzaffar
body:
For `PerLSData` struct, explicitly set the default values to avoid compiler warnings in gcc11 IBs
```
  RecoLuminosity/LumiProducer/plugins/ExpressLumiProducer.cc:63:10: warning: 'l.ExpressLumiProducer::PerLSData::deadcount' may be used uninitialized [-Wmaybe-uninitialized]
    63 |   struct PerLSData {
```

also cleaned up code to avoid creating temp `vector` and  `PerLSData` objects in `for` loop
title: [GCC11] Fix comopiler warnings for LumiProducer
